install.name: IceSlider
install.author: IceTheme
install.description: IceSlider Module is ONLY for IceTheme Club Members and can be used ONLY for IceTheme Templates

param.name: iceslider_width
param.label: Slider Width (px)
param.description: Enter the width only for the main content of the slider

param.name: iceslider_item_width
param.label: Item Width (px)
param.description: Enter the width only for one item.

param.name: iceslider_height
param.label: Slider Height (px)
param.description: Enter the height only for the main content of the slider

param.name: animation_duration
param.label: Animation Duration (ms)
param.description: How fast do you want a slide to be changed?

param.name: animation_transition
param.label: Transition Effect
param.description: Select a Transmition Effect for changing Items

param.name: autoplay
param.label: AutoPlay
param.description: Do you want to enable autoplay so the slides can change automatically.

param.name: animation_event
param.label: On MouseOver Behaviour
param.description: How do you want to change items on Mouse Over or on Mouse Click (Applicable only for tabularslide)

param.name: slidesnr
param.label: Total Images
param.description: Please list images accordion to the following list (Applicable only for imageslide and carouselslide)

param.name: iceslider_text
param.label: CarouselSlide Text
param.description: The text that you want to add below the content of the IceSlider (Applicable only for carouselslide)

param.name: catid
param.label: Category Items
param.description: Assign a Category to display Items

param.name: items
param.label: Number of Items
param.description: How many items do you want to display?

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: Add a Suffix to IceCarousel Module

param.name: cache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: cache_time
param.label: Cache Time
param.description: The time before the module is recached
